programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1002
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1003
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World M Ep755
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player M Ep529
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy M Ep30
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughterinlaw wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firms VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Marriage With A Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and her boyfriend of seven years, Sean, are to be married in a week but both cheated on each other three days before the wedding. Faced with each of their perfect partners, Kiki and Sean ignore their responsibilities to each other and choose to go their separate ways

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brothers death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Set against the siege of Stalingrad during World War II, this is the epic tale of a young Russian sharpshooter, Vassili, who becomes a legend when a savvy political officer makes him the hero of his propaganda campaign. Their friendship is threatened when both men fall in love with a beautiful female soldier. As the battle for the city rages, Vassili faces his ultimate challenge when the Nazi command dispatches its most elite marksman to hunt down and kill the man who has become the hope of all Russia.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.desc: 80 Degrees And Palm Trees - The 13 remaining chefs channel their vacation vibes when they're tasked with preparing a seafood dish inspired by tropical island cuisine; the winning dish gives the entire team immunity and claims the top-level kitchen for the next challenge.

programme.desc: On The Go - The chefs are tasked with preparing a next-level international street food dish; the platform never stops moving throughout the challenge.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12 Ep51

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12 Ep45
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. Ep1
programme.desc: On the opening edition of the spin-off show, the first six masked dancers take to the stage - Zip vs Knickerbocker Glory, Beetroot vs Llama and Viper vs Scarecrow.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. Ep2
programme.desc: The second six Masked Dancers take to the stage to perform before the virtual audience and the panel - Squirrel vs Carwash, Flamingo vs Rubber Chicken and Frog vs Beagle.

programme.title: I Am David
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy, David, escapes a Communist concentration camp with little more than a compass, a sealed letter, a loaf of bread. David is thrust into the free world for the first time in his young life as he travels across Europe.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.desc: After the highs of winning the World Championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart and discovering there are no job prospects for making music with only your mouth.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

programme.title: Escape Plan

programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and familyare killed by the infamousand elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessedwith revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: The world's foremost authority on structural security accepts a job to break out of an ultra-secret, high-tech facility. When he agrees, he is incarcerated in the most secret and secure prison on the planetand no one knows it is just a test.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: Extreme sports athlete Xander Cage (Triple X) is recruited by the government to infiltrate a Russian crime ring led by Yorgi, sparking a high-stakes adventure across Europe.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: Snake Plissken, futuristic outlaw of ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK fame, enters the island of Los Angeles (after THE earthquake) to retrieve a top-secret weapons device that, in the wrong hands, could destroy the world.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: The world's foremost authority on structural security accepts a job to break out of an ultra-secret, high-tech facility. When he agrees, he is incarcerated in the most secret and secure prison on the planetand no one knows it is just a test.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, and Wichita embark on a journey to find Little Rock, while dealing with a horde of super-zombies migrating from city to city and destroying everything in their wake.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Faye Tozer - Robson heads to the Breamish and Ingram valleys with Faye Tozer. The pair try out rock climbing and water colour painting, and join a line-dancing class.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Olly Smith - Robson invites Olly Smith for an open-air adventure in the Scottish Borders. They sample alpaca walking and sound bathing, and enjoy lunch on a paddle board.

programme.title: Serengeti S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Refuge - All our animal families make the most of the good times when a new oasis brings untold riches. But they face devastation when a towering inferno takes over. Will anyone survive?

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog. First, Gordon must train his dogs and earn their trust. Next they must learn to travel as a team.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origins - In a brutal world where nature is both friend and foe, our ancient powers are just beginning, they must use all their skill and ingenuity to shape their territory and establish their cultures.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Attend a concert in a hall that soars 50 metres into the sky, then dig 30 metres underground to explore a revolutionary farm.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Robson travels to the fishing Mecca of Hawaii to see what he can catch in this wet and wild fishing paradise.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog. First, Gordon must train his dogs and earn their trust. Next they must learn to travel as a team.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep5
programme.desc: South Africa - Robson travels 6000 miles to the most southerly point of Africa to take on an extreme fishing challenge.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sicily - Stanley Tucci visits Italy's southernmost region, Sicily. He eats timballo with a princess, explores delicious ways to prepare sardines and is invited to a dinner blending foods from across the world.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.desc: Dover - Kate follows the iconic white cliffs of Dover on a 15-mile walk of contrasts. Kate's walk begins above Folkestone Harbour at Martello Tower 3, built to defend against Napoleon.

programme.desc: Sicily - Stanley Tucci visits Italy's southernmost region, Sicily. He eats timballo with a princess, explores delicious ways to prepare sardines and is invited to a dinner blending foods from across the world.

programme.title: Race Across the World S4 Ep7
programme.desc: The teams must travel through the populous Indonesian island of Sumatra, where they will endure an ad-hoc transport system, limited accommodation options and virtually zero English spoken.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep Dark Winter - Sue Aikens sorts her plumbing before the pipes freeze. Ricko spots some moose on the way to laying traps for wolverines. Chip Hailstone and his daughters go fishing, Alaskan style. Johnny stalks a herd of caribou.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Young Up-Start - Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Turtle Beach S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - The magical days and nights when thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Centre, where a harbour seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Badalo is Missing - Watch the Onafari team get to know Aroeira, their newly collared female, and take a peek at Auroras cub, Apolo. Continue to track Badalo, who has moved deeper into the flooded forest, where he puts Lizzies game-changing research in jeopardy.

programme.title: Stormborn S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Out of the Darkness - Feel the howl of March storms as winter slowly releases its iron grip on the north Atlantic. Meet a family of playful otters, a lovelorn Arctic fox, and a reindeer herd determined to reach their calving grounds despite the fearsome weather.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - Hover near the water with the lions, who are really feeling the heat. Witness the recently subdued Nomads get more than they bargained for when they approach the all-female Hollywood pride. Then watch the cubs discover both adventure and danger.

programme.title: Turtle Beach S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - The magical days and nights when thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: After The Wildfires S1 Ep1
programme.desc: After The Wildfires - Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Badalo is Missing - Watch the Onafari team get to know Aroeira, their newly collared female, and take a peek at Auroras cub, Apolo. Continue to track Badalo, who has moved deeper into the flooded forest, where he puts Lizzies game-changing research in jeopardy.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lil' Hunters - Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem Of The North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Growing Up Gibbon - Hoolock Gibbons are specialists of the Indian Jungle. Living in close knit families, youngsters spend years learning the skills to survive. Meet Samar as he forages for food, avoids predators, and masters the acrobatics required for a life in the trees.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Land of the Secret Rhino - The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on Earth, allowing the rare Greater One-horned Rhino to survive. Follow baby rhino Rajah and his mother as she shows him what it takes to thrive in this dramatic paradise.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Stallions of the Himalayas - The Ladakh plateau is a land of extremes, but the Tibetan wild ass is the king of this grassland. Follow one stallion as he shadows a herd of females for his chance to sire the next generation, but in doing so, he must battle those wanting his crown!

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep4
programme.desc: A Sloth Bear's Dilemma - In a land of searing heat and tropical storms, life on the plains of southern India is tough. But Bibi, a female sloth bear with two cubs, is up for the challenge of her life as she fights against drought, food scarcity, and predators around every corner.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs as she forages for food and fights to keep her family safe and alive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into The Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - Meet the MK pride, led by two mighty males called the Punks, who are growing old. See younger members test their mettle as they face off with the all-male Nomad pride and the all-female Hollywood pride to defend the territory they've held for years.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - Check on the Hollywood matriarch, Ava, who is brutally wounded. Can the pride recover and rally around her? Meanwhile, observe the stealthy, dangerous tactics the MK and Nomad prides employ to protect their precious cubs and outsmart each other.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - Feel the tension ratchet up as the heat rises. Trail the Nomads on a rampage into the heart of the MK prides territory as they vie for control. Then see the recovered Ava lead the Hollywood pride, who manage to steal a prized meal from a competitor.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - Watch over precious MK cubs with the Punks, who are approaching the end of their reign but are still strong enough to drive back an interloper from the Nomad pride. Then see how the dry seasons drought conditions drive the lions to take big risks.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - Hover near the water with the lions, who are really feeling the heat. Witness the recently subdued Nomads get more than they bargained for when they approach the all-female Hollywood pride. Then watch the cubs discover both adventure and danger.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Loka The Baby Elephant - Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lankas lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but dont be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web Of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Track autumns arrival in Africa and the epic migrations it kicks off. Peer into nooks and crannies, where some creatures find one last romance before cooler weather descends, while others enjoy seasonal feasts ahead of the leaner winter months.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Loka The Baby Elephant - Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs as she forages for food and fights to keep her family safe and alive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into The Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Family Ties - The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andalucia's Struggle - Investigate the animals that have been returned to this mosaic of extreme habitats in Spain. Then discover how small environmental changes can make big differences in the populations of many endangered species and give them a real chance to recover.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Take a journey deep into the South Caribbean Sea to explore the protected waters of the Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary - In the Florida Keys, mangrove swamps serve as nurseries for fish and hunting grounds for endangered waterfowl, seagrass serves as food and shelter for fish and crustaceans, and coral reefs host diverse fish species and endangered sea turtles.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - Journey to a vast underwater rainforest of kelp thats home to hundreds of species of fish, forming the largest marine sanctuary in the U.S. Nearly destroyed by overfishing and pollution, this spectacular ecosystem is once again teeming with life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - After decades of overfishing and tourist activity, the second-longest barrier reef in the world is in jeopardy. But ocean advocates have lined the reef with a series of protected areas dedicated to maintaining its feeding and spawning grounds.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Bahamas Exuma Cays - Hundreds of tiny islands south of the Bahamian capital of Nassau form a remote wonder that was almost lost to development in the 1950s. But in 1959, the Bahamian government established the first of 31 protected areas to preserve this pristine region.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Puhsed To The Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighbouring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Young Up-Start - Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - Explore sounds beyond the range of our human hearing. Find out how alligators use low pitch rumbles to make the water around them dance, bats use sound to see, and a converted camper van conducts the ultimate hearing test for elephants.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Uncover the powerful world of scent through animals that have pushed their sense of smell way beyond human limits. Dive into shark-infested waters and swarms of bees to witness these creatures' incredible abilities.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story - March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the worlds 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are natures best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Pirate Birds - Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lion Daycare - Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Shark Dentist - Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkeys nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - Explore sounds beyond the range of our human hearing. Find out how alligators use low pitch rumbles to make the water around them dance, bats use sound to see, and a converted camper van conducts the ultimate hearing test for elephants.

programme.title: MTV Unplugged: Lenny Kravitz
programme.desc: Brace yourself as we relive Lenny Kravitz's iconic MTV Unplugged! This episode of Unplugged was taped in New York City in April of 1994.

programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Eat, Sleep, Dance, Repeat!
programme.desc: Eat, sleep, dance, repeat! Eat, sleep, dance, repeat! Eat, sleep...you get the idea! These are your essential dance hits to get you through the day!

programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2018 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.desc: Renne Rap chats to MTV about life, music and her rise to superstardom, and give us exclusive performances of two of her tracks!

programme.desc: Armani White chats to MTV about life, music and his rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of two of his tracks!

programme.desc: Flo sits down with MTV to chat about life, music and their rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of some of their tracks!

programme.title: MTV's Top 50 Collaborations
programme.desc: From the usual suspects, to the strange pairings that just work, we're counting down 50 of our favourite collabs of all time!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep10
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck / Bonestand and Deliver - Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paws anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawstons 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep5
programme.desc: Spinny Water / Kelp's Song - Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep5
programme.desc: Tree Troubles / Missing Pieces - When Marcus brings home the class tree sapling for the weekend, the Dew Drops see it starting to wilt and must cheer the sapling up, so Marcus can make sure to plant it for his class. / When Athena accidentally breaks Lola's nature sculpture, the Dew Drops must go on a scavenger hunt to replace the missing pieces.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch cant keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scoochs race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep63
programme.desc: Untitled Templeton Project - Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the towns faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep64
programme.desc: Puppy Love - Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep65
programme.desc: Biscuits Rising - Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby whos been hired to wreck Boss and Tinas lives. Crispin puts the new companys loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep9
programme.desc: Sandstorm - The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: Viking For Hire - Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep1
programme.desc: King Me - Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep2
programme.desc: Poll Position - King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Uncle King - Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: Viking For Hire - Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep66
programme.desc: Moon Shot - Our teams startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a raceloser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.desc: Unbroken - Running without Feet - Thousands of Ukrainian civilians and soldiers have lost limbs due to Russian war crimes. Yana Stepanenko is one of them. Now the teenager wants to take part in a city run, where funds raised from entry fees will go to causes for the disabled. Yanas efforts have made her an icon in Ukraine.

programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at wasabi, an eye-watering condiment with many surprising uses.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Review
programme.desc: NHK World JAPAN will broadcast Sumo review. We will look back on the year 2024, a year in which many records were broken. We will also look ahead the Grand Sumo of 2025.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: At Home In Kobe: Iniesta
programme.desc: For five years, soccer superstar Andres Iniesta lived in Kobe while playing for the local team, Vissel Kobe. Explore the city of Kobe and meet the people he came to love during his time here.

programme.desc: Kintsugi mends broken pottery with gold. An artist is restoring earthenware damaged by the Noto earthquake, helping residents put the pieces of their lives back together,too.

programme.title: Samurai Castles

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
